Title: Episode #4.10
Writer: Chris Ryan (based on the book by), Richard Zajdlic
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Robson Green, Michelle Lukes
Plot: Kamali is alive. He fooled everyone when he faked his death. Locke makes a deal with Ulyanov to capture Kamali. Kamali's team attempts to deploy the weapon at Ramstein AFB. Stonebridge and Scott have many important decisions to make.
